questions.question: The majority of Native Americans who died as a result of European Settlement died from which of the following?
Which of the following was NOT an advantage of the European Settlers over the the Native Americans?

choices.answer: Fought on land they knew well

questions.question: Which of the following results of the French and Indian War was a cause of the American Revolution?

choices.answer: France gained the last West of the Mississippi River

questions.question: How was the Ohio River Valley important to the start of the French and Indian War?

choices.answer: Spain and France disagreed over who owned the area
Native Americans blamed Spanish colonists for encroaching on the land
Britain and France disagreed over who owned the area
France and Canada both claimed the land

questions.question: What was the main effect of the Treaty of Paris of 1763?

choices.answer: France gained more land in North America
Peace between Native Americans and Colonists
Britain gained more land in North America

questions.question: What was the name for Colonists who favored independence from Britain?
What was the name for Colonists who supported the British Crown?
What did the Writs of Assistance do?

choices.answer: Prevented Colonists from moving West of the Appalachian Mountains

questions.question: Why did Colonists protest the Tea Tax?

choices.answer: Did not want to pay taxes on anything ever
Believed only the British should pay taxes
Did not want to be taxed by those who they did not elect

questions.question: Which was a result of the Boston Tea Party?

choices.answer: Creation of the Sons of Liberty

questions.question: Who did all of these things? -Organized Son's of Liberty and Boston Tea Party and used propaganda after Boston Massacre
Which of the following accomplishments is associated with George Washington?

choices.answer: Author of the Declaration of Independence
Defender of British Troops after the Boston Massacre
Organizer of the Boston Tea Party

questions.question: Who was the author of the popular pamphlet "Common Sense"?
Which answers BEST explains the contributions of women during the Revolutionary War?

choices.answer: Women contributed at home and the battlefield- some were spies
Women fought along men on the battlefield at Lexington and Concord
It was illegal for woman to contribute to the war effort

questions.question: How would you BEST describe James Otis' views during the Revolutionary Period?

choices.answer: Colonists are morally obligated to pay taxes
British Parliament is an effective governing body
The Tea Tax should replace the Stamp Act

questions.question: Put the events in order of their occurrence:

choices.answer: Proclamation of 1763, Declaration of Independence, Lexington and Concord
Stamp Act, Boston Tea Party, Declaration of Independence
Stamp Act, Declaration of Independence, Lexington and Concord
Tea Tax, Boston Tea Party, Boston Massacre

questions.question: The Intolerable Acts were passed as a result of
Why did the Continental Congress issue the Olive Branch Petition?

choices.answer: Wanted to formally apologize to the King for the Boston Tea Party
Wanted to make peace following the Boston Massacre
Wanted to peacefully negotiate for the protection of natural rights

questions.question: What were the effects of the British sending troops to Concord to seize weapons?

choices.answer: King George responds to the Olive Branch Petition
First shots are fired and war begins between Colonies and Britain
Colonists begin to boycott British goods

questions.question: Which of the following was a cause of the Boston Tea Party?

choices.answer: The Battles of Lexington and Concord
The King's response to the Olive Branch Petition
